name: Felecia Caton Garcia
bio: Felecia Caton Garcia is the author of Say That (University of New Mexico Press, 2013). She earned an MFA in creative writing from the University of Oregon and a PhD in American Studies from the University of New Mexico. Her poetry has been published in former U.S. Poet Laureate Ted Kooser's column, "American Life in Poetry." She teaches writing and cultural studies at Central New Mexico Community College in Albuquerque.
